name: Development Cycle Meta-Router V1

stages.name: Request Classification
stages.description: Classify user request as bug fix, feature request, refactor, or question

decisions.description: Request is a simple code modification

stages.name: Bug Fix Pipeline
stages.description: Execute bug-fix-v1 pipeline for bug fixes

stages.name: Quick Code Change
stages.description: Handle simple, direct code modifications (1-5 lines)

stages.name: Feature Development Pipeline
stages.description: Execute feature-development-v1 pipeline for new features

stages.name: Handle Question
stages.description: Answer user questions about code or system

connections.description: Bug detected, route to bug-fix pipeline
Simple change requested, use direct code implementer
Feature requested, route to feature-development pipeline
Bug fix pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS
Feature development pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS

userContext:
Critical bug: Ship movement is completely non-functional. Navigation commands and tap-to-move inputs are not translating to actual ship movement on screen. Debug and fix the ship movement system:

1. Verify input detection (tap-to-move and navigation commands)
2. Check if movement commands are being processed
3. Verify physics/position updates are occurring
4. Ensure rendering is reflecting position changes
5. Fix the broken connection between input → movement logic → visual output
6. Test to confirm ships actually move when commanded

results.classify_request:
```json
{
  "classification": "BUG_FIX",
  "confidence": 0.99,
  "reasoning": "This is clearly a bug fix request. The user explicitly states 'Critical bug' and describes a broken core functionality - ship movement is 'completely non-functional'. The request includes systematic debugging steps and a clear fix objective: restore ship movement functionality. Keywords like 'non-functional', 'broken', 'fix', and 'debug' are strong bug fix indicators.",
  "context": {
    "originalRequest": "Critical bug: Ship movement is completely non-functional. Navigation commands and tap-to-move inputs are not translating to actual ship movement on screen. Debug and fix the ship movement system",
    "keyIndicators": ["Critical bug", "non-functional", "not translating", "broken", "fix", "debug"],
    "affectedArea": "ship movement system, input processing, physics updates, rendering",
    "priority": "high",
    "debuggingSteps": [
      "Verify input detection",
      "Check movement command processing",
      "Verify physics/position updates",
      "Ensure rendering reflects position changes",
      "Fix input → movement → visual pipeline",
      "Test movement functionality"
    ],
    "subsystemsInvolved": [
      "InputManager / MobileInputManager",
      "Ship movement logic",
      "ShipPhysics",
      "Rendering/SceneManager"
    ]
  }
}
```

DECISION: BUG_FIX
